eligibility:
Pass in class 12 (10+2) is the minimum eligibility for applying / admission (Karnataka PUC, ISC, CBSE, NIOS and State Boards).
Candidates writing the +2 examinations in March-May 2025 may apply with their class X and XI marks.
Candidates must register with the ICAI prior to the selection process (Mandatory)
Students pursuing an International curriculum must note that eligibility is according to AIU stipulations
Applicants pursuing IB curriculum must have 3 HL and 3 SL with 24 credits. Applicants pursuing GCE / Edexcel must have a minimum of 3 A levels grade not less than C.
why_choose: Why choose this course? Facilitation to qualify the professional examinations of CA Skill enhancement elective based on ICAI-CA curriculum Advanced knowledge of Accounting, Auditing and Taxation Employability skill enhancement courses like Advanced Excel, Tableau & Python Right blend of seasoned Academicians & practising professionals Mentoring by practising Chartered Accountants
what_learn: What you will learn? Accounting and Auditing standards for financial statements Proficiency in financial and corporate reporting Expertise to assume an advisory role in Finance, Accounting and International Taxation Legal and regulatory frameworks Interdisciplinary and multidisciplinary skills for professional practice
